Lesion Modelling


This page lists research, authored by NISOx and NISOx collaborators, concerned with lesion modelling, including both Multiple Sclerosis lesions and White Matter Hyperintensities.

Publications

  • Analysis of multiple sclerosis lesions via spatially varying coefficients
    Ge, T., Müller-Lenke, N., Bendfeldt, K., Nichols, T. E., & Johnson, T. D. The Annals of Applied Statistics 8(2): 1095–1118. doi: https://doi.org/10.1214/14-AOAS718
  • Spatial Modeling of Multiple Sclerosis for Disease Subtype Prediction
    Taschler, B., Ge, T., Bendfeldt, K., Müller-Lenke, N., Johnson, T. D., & Nichols, T. E. Computing and Computer-Assisted Intervention – MICCAI 2014 Vol. 8674, pp. 797–804. doi: https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-10470-6_99



Oxford Big Data Institute at the University of Oxford
